First, force analysis of the object, as shown in the figure.
According to equilibrium conditions, horizontal direction, there are: Fcosθ - f = 0, vertical direction, there are: N + Fsinθ - G = 0, among them: f = μN, therefore: F = μG / cosθ + μsinθ.
Next, Let μ = tanα, then sinαG / F = cos(α - θ). When α - θ = 0°, F has a minimum value, so F = sinαg = 90N, so α = 37°, Thus μ = tan37° = 0.75, θ = 37°.
